author: john monkan
comment: Elegant design looks so good these are high quality faces please keep them coming and would love options to Change hand colors and a day and date can't say anything bad... Also if u need a beta tester lol I'm here for you!!
title: Amazing

author: Andrew Staley
comment: I love how this face is Moto 360 friendly. It adjusts the face to account for the "flat tire" ambient sensors.
title: Finally a watch face that's Moto 360 friendly!

author: Todd Dixon
comment: But, it's a battery drainer on the LG watch R
title: Great Watch Face

author: David Richards
comment: How about an update with day date, otherwise a great looking watch Face

author: Vlad Andrei Popa
comment: I honestly belive the watch faces from Omitsis are the best on Play Store. Very elegant, great details, even in dimmed mode. Although not stated they work great on the LG G Watch R also. What would make them truly perfect would be a discreet date window.

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content:
Thanks for your suggestion! 
We are working on new exciting models that will include date as well. 
;)

title: Best Wear watch faces

author: Don C
comment: Changes from green to gold. Very annoying.  It only takes a few seconds to tell time. the lag kills this watchface.

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content:
Hi, thanks for your feedback
The green screen is the energy saving screen. After some seconds when the watch powers down, you see the green arrows as a minimalist not energy consuming face. 
About the lag, We will upload a new version tomorrow that smooths the animation and should not be laggy anymore.

title: Lag issues.

author: Oriol Mercadé
comment: Perfect goldish hands for an elegant watch!
